name: Tell Me Your Story
description:
Tell Me Your Story is a storytelling web app which can be played offline or you can upload it to your server and share it with others. 

Simply, it is a storytelling app which gives you five random cards and you make up a story by using those cards. If you are familiar with the Rory's story cubes, you have already known what my inspiration is. 

To make it more interesting, I added some difficulty levels in which new game elements were added. 

The idea behind the game was to bring some fun to the online lessons, especially for language lessons.
